                <!--以下编辑器输出内容-->
     <article class="txt-detail">
        
    <!--AIGCV0.1 start-->
        <!--AIGCV0.1 end-->
        
                   <div class="describe">云网专享~</div>
        
                    <div class="baoliao-block">
                        </div>

              <div class="baoliao-block"> <div class="name"><strong class="one-line">小编说：</strong></div><p itemprop="description">即日起至3月31日，用户使用62开头境内工银储蓄卡、信用卡通过<strong>工银e生活App/中国工商银行App</strong>（APP需更新升级至最新版本并授权开通云闪付网络支付服务）进行线上控件支付有机会可享受<span style="color: rgb(187, 2, 0);"><strong>满10元立减1元、满100元立减5元</strong></span>优惠。</p><p itemprop="description">每活动日名额有限，用完即止，先到先得，储蓄卡满10减1元单日限量1万份、满100减5元单日限量0.2万份，信用卡满10减1元单日限量1万份、满100减5元单日限量0.2万份。</p><p itemprop="description"><a itemprop="description" id="link_1740105459048" href="https://content.cup.com.cn/UCIWeb/outputWeb/coupon/coupon.html#/couponDetail?couponId=2102025021701395" target="_blank" quota_pre="" quota="" type="" title="优惠券">活动一：【云闪付】 工行借记卡满10减1元立减 </a><br><a itemprop="description" id="link_1740105464776" href="https://content.cup.com.cn/UCIWeb/outputWeb/coupon/coupon.html#/couponDetail?couponId=2102025021701409" target="_blank" quota_pre="" quota="" type="" title="优惠券">活动二：【云闪付】 工行信用卡满10减1元立减</a><br><a itemprop="description" id="link_1740105471009" href="https://content.cup.com.cn/UCIWeb/outputWeb/coupon/coupon.html#/couponDetail?couponId=2102025021701410" target="_blank" quota_pre="" quota="" type="" title="优惠券">活动三：【云闪付】 工行借记卡满100减5元立减 </a><br><a itemprop="description" id="link_1740105479305" href="https://content.cup.com.cn/UCIWeb/outputWeb/coupon/coupon.html#/couponDetail?couponId=2102025021701412" target="_blank" quota_pre="" quota="" type="" title="优惠券">活动四：【云闪付】 工行信用卡满100减5元立减</a> <br></p> </div>
                    
                 </article>
    <!--编辑器输出内容end-->
        
                      <div class="interests-statement">
                      什么值得买是一家中立的消费门户网站，好价信息来自热心值友爆料和商家自荐，经小编人工审核或小值机器人智能判断后发布。促销折扣可能随时变化，请值友们购买前注意核实。

                                <!-- 表情包及表单提交操作 -->
                                <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-textarea-opertion">

                                    <div>
                                        <p>校验提示文案</p>
                                        <div class="J_submit">提交</div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>

                                </div>

                                <div class="content-operation"> <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 新增class content-operation -->
                                
                                                                        <!-- 点赞 -->
                                    <div class="J_zan comment-main-list-item-content-info-zan" id="cdc_support_340473081" data-item="3, 1, 340473081, 141630101, 340473081">
                                        <span>1</span>
                                        <i class="icon-thumb-up-o-thin"></i>
                                        <!-- <i class="icon-thumb-up"></i> -->
                                    </div>
                                    <!-- 点踩 --> <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 新增点踩按钮 start --> <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 新增class J_cai 删除class caiNum -->
                                    <div class="J_cai comment-main-list-item-content-info-zan ">
                                        <!-- <i class="icon-thumb-down-o-thin"></i> -->
                                        <!-- 已点踩 -->
                                        <!-- <i class="icon-thumb-down"></i> -->
                                        <i class="icon-thumb-down-o-thin"></i>                                        <!--FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 取消点踩提示 start -->
                                        <div class="tips-down">
                                            <div class="content">
                                                取消点踩展示评论
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="arrow">
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                        <!--FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 取消点踩提示 end -->

                                    </div>

                                    <div class="J_replay comment-main-list-item-content-info-replay">回复</div>
                                </div>
                            </div>

<!-- 删除评论的二次确认弹窗 -->

    <div class="del-comment-confirm-mask"></div>
    <div class="del-comment-confirm">
        <div class="del-comment-confirm-title">提示信息</div>
        <p class="del-comment-confirm-content"></p>
        <div class="del-comment-confirm-group">
            <div class="del-comment-btn-cancel">取消</div>
            <div class="del-comment-btn-confirm">确认</div>
        </div>
        <div class="del-comment-confirm-close">
            <div class="del-comment-confirm-close-body icon-times-o"></div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <i id="popClose" class="pop-close icon-times-o-thin">
        <!--[if lt IE 8]>x<![endif]--></i>
    <div class="pop-title" id="popTitle">
        <div class="pop-name">评论举报</div>
    </div>
    <div class="pop-content">
        <div class="pop_width_400">
            <p class="pop_info">
                <span class="pop_jubao jubao-circle">
                    <input type="radio" class="normal" id="pop_report_1" name="report">
                    <label for="pop_report_1">垃圾广告！</label></span>
                <span class="pop_jubao jubao-circle">
                    <input type="radio" class="normal" id="pop_report_2" name="report">
                    <label for="pop_report_2">低俗色情！</label></span>
                <span class="pop_jubao jubao-circle">
                    <input type="radio" class="normal" id="pop_report_3" name="report">
                    <label for="pop_report_3">人身攻击！</label></span>
                <span class="pop_jubao jubao-circle">
                    <input type="radio" class="normal" id="pop_report_4" name="report">
                    <label for="pop_report_4">疑似水军评论！</label></span>
                <span class="pop_jubao_other jubao-circle">
                    <input type="radio" id="pop_report_9" name="report">
                    <label for="pop_report_9">其他有害！</label></span>
            </p>
            <div id="pop_report_opinion" style="display:none;">
                <textarea cols="6" rows="80" class="textarea" onfocus="document.getElementById('note').style.display='none'" onblur="if(value=='')document.getElementById('note').style.display='block'" style="width:378px;"></textarea>
                <div id="note" class="note">请输入举报内容，最少输入2个字</div>
                <p>
                </p>
            </div>
            <input type="submit" class="btn-cancel" value="取消">
            <input id="pop_report_submit" type="submit" class="btn_login btn_login1" value="确定">
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
